name: mapreduce.job.speculative.retry-after-speculate
description:
The waiting time(ms) to do next round of speculation
  if there are tasks speculated in this round.

name: dfs.http.client.retry.max.attempts
description:
Specify the max number of retry attempts for WebHDFS client,
    if the difference between retried attempts and failovered attempts is
    larger than the max number of retry attempts, there will be no more
    retries.

name: dfs.namenode.edekcacheloader.interval.ms
description:
When KeyProvider is configured, the interval time of warming
    up edek cache on NN starts up / becomes active. All edeks will be loaded
    from KMS into provider cache. The edek cache loader will try to warm up the
    cache until succeed or NN leaves active state.

name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.factor
description:
The number of streams to merge at once while sorting
  files.  This determines the number of open file handles.

name: dfs.client-write-packet-size
description: Packet size for clients to write

name: dfs.datanode.slowpeer.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a DataNode is definitely not slow.

name: hadoop.http.cross-origin.max-age
description:
The number of seconds a pre-flighted request can be cached
    for web services needing cross-origin (CORS) support.
